title: Strange 'copy package' Bug in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui
description: When attempting to copy a package in the org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui of project xxx, there's a strange issue.
OB: When trying to copy a package, the 'copy package' functionality does not work as expected.
EB: The 'copy package' operation should work correctly in the org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui of project xxx.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new project named xxx.
2. In the Package viewer, select a package within the project (e.g., from the context menu, choose 'copy').
